Baume & Mercier 17 Jewels Movement 18k Yellow Gold Open Face Pocket Watch Estate Up for sale is a Baume & Mercier 18k Yellow Gold Open Face Pocket Watch. Round 18k Yellow Gold case. Signed gold sunburst dial with black applied Roman numerals and black pointed hands. In excellent vintage condition. Signed Mechanical movement, 17 jewels. Weight is 32.7 grams Movement: Signed Mechanical movement, 17 jewels. Case: Round 18k Yellow Gold Case no. 30329. Case Size: 37 mm Dial: Signed gold sunburst dial with black applied Roman numerals and black pointed hands. Original black leather pouch Condition: In Excellent Working Condition PICTURES: We try our best to show how it looks in real life, but the pictures sometime do not show the real sparkle of the jewelry or crystal item.
